greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positive integers k such that f(k)+f(k)=concatenation of k and k, where f(k)=k(k+3)/2 (A000096).
comment: By the definition, k*(k+3) = k*10^m+k. So k+3 = 10^m+1, that is k = 10^m-2. - _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 31 2019
program: (PARI) for(k=1, 1e9, if(k*(k+3)==eval(Str(k, k)), print1(k", "))) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 31 2019
results.author: _John W. Layman_, Sep 30 2004
